Complete combat arsenal - 60 cards Essential collection of 60 cards to arm your fighters: complete arsenal of melee and ranged weapons, light to heavy protection, and shields. Contents:\n- 44 weapons : melee, ranged, exotic, modern and futuristic firearms\n- 14 armor : light, medium, heavy\n- 2 shields : metal and wood\nEverything needed to outfit warriors, adventurers and soldiers!
